actions.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning

official_title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to qualify additional institutions for programs under part B of title III of that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to qualify additional institutions for programs for strengthening historically Black colleges and universities. Makes eligible for such programs an institution in a State where no other institution meets all program eligibility requirements, if it meets all such requirements except that it was established during or after 1964 but before 1978.

titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to qualify additional institutions for programs under part B of title III of that Act.
